tool_description: Structure offers comprehensive data on more than 700 million individuals worldwide by connecting B2B data, like work history and education, to company data. We offer data on over 24 million company profiles. Our data is optimized for hundreds of applications, ranging from recruiting platforms and fraud detection tools to workforce planning applications and marketing tools. Our person database is fueled by dozens of public contributing data sources including LinkedIn, Google, Twitter, Github, ...
name: Structure
title: Structure

api_list.name: list_employees
api_list.description: Generate a list of employees for a company

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The offset number to start at

api_list.name: list_jobs
api_list.description: Generate a list of jobs for a company

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The offset number to start at

api_list.name: enrich_person
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://structure.p.rapidapi.com/people/williamhgates/enrich"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "structure.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://structure.p.rapidapi.com/people/{id}/enrich"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "structure.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: Enrich a company profile based on linkedIn key.
